metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8283 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.51 and earlier, 5.6.32 andearlier, and 5.7.14 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to affectavailability via vectors related to Server: Types.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-server-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-source-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.28-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
